$comment: This schema is inherited from the item level schema, which defines the structure. This schema adds the values specific to the MUDL items.

mudlProperties.description: MUDL-specific constraints on the properties section.

embeddable.description: Can this item be embedded in another website using the embeddable viewer or not.

useTranscriptions.description: Does this item contain transcription information

transcriptionType.description: If transcriptions are used, are they normalised, diplomatic or both (with different urls).

useTranslations.description: Does this item contain translation information

sourceData.description: Relative local path to the source metadata, e.g. 'tei/foo.xml'

thumbnailUrl.description: URL for the thumbnail image to use, if not specified the first page is used.

displayImageRights.description: A description of the rights for the display images of this item. Displayed on item web page.

downloadImageRights.description: A description of the rights for the download images in this item. Displayed on image download. If not specified download not allowed.

linkToImageReproductionRequestPage.description: This is a link to request reproduction rights to these images.

mudlPropertiesDataEntry.$comment: Either no @role or a role with: mudl-role:item-properties

classmark.description: The classmark or human-readable id for this item.

title: Package JSON Item - Constrained for MUDL
description: This schema constrains the general Package JSON Item to match the data expected by MUDL.
